item.title: Cooking
item.description: Hey there. My name is Vega, and I can’t cook, so I’ll be letting my friends take this one over. Why you should take the time to be a functional adult: # I had a few friends interested in fleshing this page out, but they got busy, let me know if you want to take it over or just submit a pull request
